/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the highway, giving a driver's eye view of the surroundings. The highway itself is divided by a concrete overpass, under which cars can be seen traveling. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. On either side of the highway, there are trees and buildings, adding to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the overpass and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue sky and the gray of the concrete overpass.
